description: Numbers n such that 5*n - 2 is prime.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: lst={};Do[p=5*n-2;If[PrimeQ[p], AppendTo[lst, n]], {n, 0, 10^3}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Sep 10 2008 *)Select[Range[300], PrimeQ[5 # - 2] &] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 25 2012 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
